company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.

company_desc: ITSEC is one of the leading cybersecurity companies in the APAC region, listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX), with over 300 employees across five countries. We deliver end-to-end cybersecurity services and solutions, including Consulting Services, Security Solutions Integration, and Managed Security Services. ITSEC provides continuous IT infrastructure protection against multiplying cybersecurity threats and ensures compliance with increasingly demanding data protection and critical infrastructure regulations. Our expertise has been built over a decade of delivering thousands of high-quality cybersecurity projects, providing cutting-edge solutions in collaboration with world-class technology partners across financial, telecommunications, energy, transportation, manufacturing, and other critical industry sectors. We also have extensive experience in helping our customers with fraud prevention, Operational Technology (OT), and Industrial IoT (IIoT) security.

company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.

company_desc: Didirikan dengan nama PT Sanghiang Perkasa, selama ini kami dikenal masyarakat sebagai Kalbe Health Foods Division dari PT Kalbe Farma Tbk., perusahaan farmasi terkemuka di Indonesia. company_desc: Imagine a career where you play a pivotal role in ensuring the success and bright future of 80 million children in Indonesia. Tentang Anak is not just a company; it's a mission, a movement, and an opportunity to be part of something truly extraordinary.
job_desc_list: ["Imagine a career where you play a pivotal role in ensuring the success and bright future of 80 million children in Indonesia. Tentang Anak is not just a company; it's a mission, a movement, and an opportunity to be part of something truly extraordinary.", 'Tentang Anak, at its core, is driven by a mission to advance the well-being and development of 80 million children throughout Indonesia. Founded by a team of experts, including pediatricians, child psychologists, and early childhood educators, we are steadfast in our commitment to supporting children with the most reliable education and products. From educational tools (e.g., applications, books, flashcards, puzzles) to essential skincare, Tentang Anak aims to accompany and provide the best solutions for parents and their children, from the moment they wake up until they fall asleep.', 'Our products are the one and only in Indonesia that are developed by experts, backed by science, and offered at affordable prices. We are humbled by the love our products receive from parents, consistently ranking our Educational Tools and Skincare highly on e-commerce platforms, making them best-sellers. We will continue to innovate and provide better solutions for parents at every step of their journey. We are dedicated to creating a brighter, healthier, and happier future for the children of Indonesia.', 'Our employees, whom we call TAmily, are a group of relentless and passionate individuals who share the same mission and ambitions. Are you ready to join us in this mission?', 'We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Product Ops and Content for Tentang Anak Application. Your role is crucial to increase user traffic and stickiness to Tentang Anak App and ensure content relevancy. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring operation in App content updates and stay relevant, creating SEO-based articles that are informative and engaging, strategizing and executing push notifications to effectively engage our user base, and finally all features within the app is managed effectively on a daily basis.']
job_qualification_list: ['Proven 1+ year experience in content writing, and copywriting, with a strong portfolio demonstrating writing skills and creativity', 'Proven 1+ year experience managing Applications, to ensure operation and content in the App stay relevant and updated.\xa0', 'Have an in-depth understanding of SEO best practices and content optimization techniques', 'Experience in mobile app content creation and push notification management would be an advantage', 'Strong research skills and the ability to synthesize information from various sources', 'Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and insights to optimize content and push notification strategies']

job_position: Master Teacher Ruangguru - Kabupaten Rokan Hulu

company_desc: Didirikan dengan nama PT Sanghiang Perkasa, selama ini kami dikenal masyarakat sebagai Kalbe Health Foods Division dari PT Kalbe Farma Tbk., perusahaan farmasi terkemuka di Indonesia. Guna meningkatkan kinerja perusahaan dan lebih mendekatkan diri kepada konsumen, pada tahun 2007 kami melakukan perubahan brand identity perusahaan. Melalui proses seksama, nama Kalbe Farma Health Foods Division akhirnya diubah menjadi Kalbe Nutritionals. company_desc: is the number one dropshipping supplier in Indonesia, which has sold many hi-tech gadgets, and innovative products. Yummy Bites hadir sejak tahun 2015 dengan berbagai makanan utama dan selingan bagi Si Kecil dengan kualitas terbaik, berbahan dasar alami, organik dan tanpa pengawet. Memiliki sertifikat HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points), BRC (British Retail Consortium), dan telah lulus dari sertifikasi standard internasional hingga menjamin kualiti kontrol untuk kebersihan serta keamanan produk. Yummy Bites berkomitmen selalu memberikan kualitas yang terbaik agar selalu menjadi pilihan Bunda untuk Si Kecil.

company_desc: Established in 1989, PT. Pratama Abadi Industri is a foreign investment company (Korean) that runs manufacturing athletic shoes for the NIKE brand. This company is considered one of the shoe manufacturers with the most extended history in producing athletic shoes for the NIKE brand in Indonesia. Supported by four factories, Serpong Factory (Head Office), Sukabumi Factory, Brebes Factory, and Garut Factory. Pratama Abadi Industri can produce 2 million pairs of high-quality athletic shoes a month. Equipped with modern technology machinery and supported by our experienced team are committed to creating high-quality athletic shoes. Our vision is to be a world-class footwear manufacturer and our mission is to lead the Change to be a sustainable source base. We have teamwork and work team, ownership, quality first, defiance, and open mind as our core values.

company_desc: Ruangguru merupakan perusahaan teknologi terbesar dan terlengkap di Indonesia yang berfokus pada layanan berbasis pendidikan dan telah memiliki lebih dari 13 juta pengguna serta telah mengelola lebih dari 500.000 guru yang menawarkan jasa di lebih dari 100 bidang pelajaran. company_desc: PT Leon Boga Sentosa merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak dalam bidang importir, produksi, dan distribusi makanan bayi dengan merek YUMMY BITES Our Vision: Menjadi perusahaan makanan bayi skala nasional Our Mission: Menjadi perusahaan yang menyediakan makanan bayi yang mempunyai standar tinggi untuk kebutuhan nutrisi bayi. Yummy Bites hadir sejak tahun 2015 dengan berbagai makanan utama dan selingan bagi Si Kecil dengan kualitas terbaik, berbahan dasar alami, organik dan tanpa pengawet. Memiliki sertifikat HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points), BRC (British Retail Consortium), dan telah lulus dari sertifikasi standard internasional hingga menjamin kualiti kontrol untuk kebersihan serta keamanan produk. company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). company_desc: ITSEC is one of the leading cybersecurity companies in the APAC region, listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX), with over 300 employees across five countries. We deliver end-to-end cybersecurity services and solutions, including Consulting Services, Security Solutions Integration, and Managed Security Services. ITSEC provides continuous IT infrastructure protection against multiplying cybersecurity threats and ensures compliance with increasingly demanding data protection and critical infrastructure regulations. Our expertise has been built over a decade of delivering thousands of high-quality cybersecurity projects, providing cutting-edge solutions in collaboration with world-class technology partners across financial, telecommunications, energy, transportation, manufacturing, and other critical industry sectors. We also have extensive experience in helping our customers with fraud prevention, Operational Technology (OT), and Industrial IoT (IIoT) security.

job_desc_list: ['Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and design scalable and secure AWS solutions.\xa0', 'Architect, design, and implement cloud security solutions to protect sensitive information\xa0and ensure compliance with industry standards.\xa0', 'Provide expertise in identity and access management, encryption, network security, and\xa0other security-related AWS services.\xa0', 'Conduct security assessments including penetration tests and recommend enhancements to address vulnerabilities and mitigate risks.\xa0', 'Conduct regular system audits to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security standards.', 'Develop and maintain our incident response plan, including monitoring systems for anomalies and responding to security incidents.', 'Work closely with development and operations teams to integrate security controls into the CI/CD pipeline.\xa0', 'Stay up to date on industry best practices, AWS security features, and emerging threats to continually improve the security posture of our systems.\xa0', 'Develop and deliver security training and awareness programs to staff.', 'Assist in the creation and maintenance of security policies, procedures, and documentation.']
job_qualification_list: ['CISSP certified.\xa0', 'Proven experience as a Cybersecurity Engineer with a focus on security in AWS.\xa0', 'In-depth knowledge of AWS services, including but not limited to EC2, S3, Lambda, IAM, VPC, KMS, CloudWatch, and CloudTrail.\xa0', 'Strong understanding of security principles, best practices, and standards in cloud\xa0environments.\xa0', 'Experience with designing and implementing secure, multi-tier, highly available architectures on AWS.\xa0', 'Ability to perform security audits on applications even though they are not hosted on the cloud.\xa0', 'Knowledge in fundamental database security and application security to address vulnerabilities such as Cross-Site Scripting, Cross-Site Request Forgery, SQL Injection, HTML Injection, etc.\xa0', 'Familiarity with compliance frameworks such as GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC 2.\xa0', 'Hands-on experience with security tools and technologies, such as AWS Security Hub,\xa0', 'GuardDuty, and WAF.\xa0', 'Knowledge of disaster recovery, computer forensic tools, technologies, and methods.', 'Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to explain complex security concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders.', 'Other certifications such as CISM, CEH, CompTIA Security+, or similar will be advantageous.']

company_desc: At Reemotely, we connect businesses with top-tier virtual professionals, helping companies build agile,Â scalable teams without the overhead costs. Our remote talent solutions empower businesses in SingaporeÂ to grow efficiently, adapt quickly, and stay competitive by tapping into global expertise.
job_desc_list: ['At Reemotely, we are revolutionizing the way businesses access talent by connecting companies with top-tier virtual professionals. We believe in the power of a borderless workforce, where skills and expertise know no geographical limits. Our mission is to empower businesses to build agile, scalable teams tailored to their unique needs, enabling them to focus on growth and innovation.', 'We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented ', 'to join our growing team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing user-centric web and mobile experiences that are both visually appealing and highly functional. You will collaborate closely with our marketing, development, and product teams to deliver digital interfaces that delight users and drive results.', "If you're passionate about intuitive design, user research, and building beautiful interfaces that improve usability and engagement, weâ€™d love to hear from you!"]
job_qualification_list: ['Design intuitive and visually compelling user interfaces for websites, landing pages, and digital platforms.', 'Develop wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and user flows that effectively communicate design ideas.', 'Translate concepts into user-friendly, responsive design across multiple devices and screen sizes.', 'Create and maintain design systems, style guides, and asset libraries.', 'Conduct user research and gather feedback to guide design decisions.', 'Perform usability testing and analyze user behavior to improve the experience.', 'Iterate designs based on insights and analytics to enhance usability and performance.', 'Work closely with developers to ensure designs are implemented accurately.', 'Collaborate with the content, product, and marketing teams to align design with business goals.', 'Participate in brainstorming sessions, sprint planning, and project reviews.', 'Min. 1 year of experience in UI/UX design or a similar role.', 'Strong portfolio showcasing web and/or mobile projects with a focus on user-centered design.', 'Proficiency in design and prototyping tools (e.g., Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, InVision).', 'Solid understanding of UX principles, interaction design, and responsive design.', 'Experience with usability testing, user research, and A/B testing tools is a plus.', 'Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS is a bonus (not required, but helpful for collaboration with devs).']

company_desc: PT. Sinar Bintang Buana, dengan brand name House of Donatello adalah sebuah Perusahaan alas kaki yang didirikan di Bandung pada tahun 1999, menjual berbagai model alas kaki (sandal & sepatu) untuk berbagai kalangan usia dengan mengikuti trend yang ada. Selain alas kaki, juga menjual tas pria dan wanita yang trendi. House of Donatello telah beroperasi selama lebih dari 20 tahun, dan saat ini telah memiliki lebih dari 20 gerai yang tersebar di kota-kota di Indonesia. Perkembangan dunia fashion yang sangat cepat menjadi tantangan tersediri bagi House of Donatello untuk terus memberikan inovasi kreatif dan menjaga kualitas produk. Selain dari perkembangan dunia fashion, House of Donatello juga sangat aktif dalam mengikuti perkembangan teknologi untuk terus dapat menjangkau konsumen dan memberikan kemudahan bagi konsumen untuk dapat mengenal brand kami.
job_desc_list: ['Develop and implement comprehensive strategies for Tiktok in alignment with brand objectives and target audience.', 'Create engaging Tiktok content showcasing products authentically.', 'Monitor Fashion industry trends and platform update to enhance social media presence.', 'Analyze tiktok metrics to evaluate campaign performance and provide insight for optimization.', 'Maintain communication with third party such as Relation Manager from TikTok company or Affiliator for growth and planning strategies.', 'Position Job Scope including, but not limited to maintain other E-commerce such as shopee, etc.']

company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.

company_desc: Established in 1989, PT. Pratama Abadi Industri is a foreign investment company (Korean) that runs manufacturing athletic shoes for the NIKE brand. This company is considered one of the shoe manufacturers with the most extended history in producing athletic shoes for the NIKE brand in Indonesia. Supported by four factories, Serpong Factory (Head Office), Sukabumi Factory, Brebes Factory, and Garut Factory. Pratama Abadi Industri can produce 2 million pairs of high-quality athletic shoes a month. Equipped with modern technology machinery and supported by our experienced team are committed to creating high-quality athletic shoes. Our vision is to be a world-class footwear manufacturer and our mission is to lead the Change to be a sustainable source base. We have teamwork and work team, ownership, quality first, defiance, and open mind as our core values.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

While rooted in Jakarta and Bali, we are driven by the vision of becoming a global fashion brand. Our journey extends beyond borders as we set our sights on establishing our presence internationally, spreading our love for fashion to customers around the globe. company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

job_qualification_list: ['At least 3 - 4 year(s) of previous experience in Corporate (B2B)/Account Executive Hospital', 'MUST have previous working experience in Plenary accreditation (5 stars) hospitals/prominent clinic', 'Experienced in analyzing the domestic market, not limited to territories, consumers and competitors.', 'Experienced in creating, evaluating and developing cooperation program with companies/hospitals.', 'Experienced in opening acquaintanceship and cooperation with companies/hospitals.', 'Experienced in creating, implementing, and evaluating visit and promotional activity plan.', 'Experienced in creating and presenting business/product & services presentation']

company_desc: RedDoorz is Southeast Asiaâ€™s largest and fast-growing, technology-driven hospitality brand. With a vision to enable people to travel more and provide affordable, reliable stays in all major cities and destinations across the region, RedDoorz is disrupting the hospitality industry by transforming the fragmented supply inventory into branded, standardized accommodations.
job_desc_list: ['Develop and implement sales strategies to meet or exceed revenue targets for villa rentals.', 'Identify new business opportunities and generate leads through networking, cold calling, and industry events.', 'Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, including corporate accounts, travel agencies, and real estate agents.', 'Conduct property tours and presentations to prospective clients.', 'Negotiate contracts and agreements to secure bookings.', 'Collaborate with the marketing team to create promotional materials and campaigns for villa rentals.', 'Provide exceptional customer service and support throughout the sales process.', 'Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to adjust sales strategies accordingly.', 'Prepare regular sales reports and forecasts for management review.']
job_qualification_list: ['Proven experience in sales, preferably in the villa, hospitality, or real estate industry.', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.', 'Strong negotiation abilities with a customer-focused mindset.', 'Ability to work independently and as part of a team.', 'Proficiency in Google Workspace.']

job_desc_list: ['This role designs applications required to automate business processes and meet business needs. The resulting design may run on multiple platforms and may be composed of multiple software packages and custom components.', 'This role defines best practices in the critical evaluation and selection and / or development of the software components and hardware requirements of the applications and data, and the development of the application, including evaluation and selection of development methods, development processes, best practices and tools.', 'Applications Architects are responsible for applications-related quality, performance, availability, scalability, and integrity. company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: Didirikan pada tahun 1993, Cimory Group adalah produsen produk makanan dan minuman kemasan berbasis protein dari Indonesia. Kami telah berkembang pesat sebagai pangsa pasar terkemuka dalam produk yogurt dan sosis premium. Didukung oleh kinerja yang sangat baik dari bisnis Produk Susu Premium dan Makanan Konsumen Premium, kami mengambil langkah penting dengan keberhasilan pelaksanaan IPO Cimory untuk menjadi perusahaan publik. Kami percaya bahwa ini akan menjadi pendorong penting bagi pertumbuhan bisnis dan pemenuhan kebutuhan protein sebagai nutrisi penting bagi tumbuh kembang masyarakat Indonesia.

company_desc: Didirikan dengan nama PT Sanghiang Perkasa, selama ini kami dikenal masyarakat sebagai Kalbe Health Foods Division dari PT Kalbe Farma Tbk., perusahaan farmasi terkemuka di Indonesia. Guna meningkatkan kinerja perusahaan dan lebih mendekatkan diri kepada konsumen, pada tahun 2007 kami melakukan perubahan brand identity perusahaan. Melalui proses seksama, nama Kalbe Farma Health Foods Division akhirnya diubah menjadi Kalbe Nutritionals. Corporate brand identity baru yang membawa nama Kalbe ini mempertegas kepercayaan kami sebagai perusahaan yang sudah memiliki reputasi tinggi. Wajah baru tersebut sekaligus mempertajam komitmen kami dalam bidang bisnis makanan kesehatan dan komitmen akan pentingnya kehidupan.Â Â

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: EFâ€™s mission is to open the world through education. We're paving new roads for learning â€“ using technology, research and design. Our "for profit, for good" ethos is what motivates our people to do better work every day and drives our business to grow year on year. Since it was established in 1986 in Indonesia, EF has been serving various segments ranging from professional, corporate, and kids & teens. Currently, we have centers in Jakarta and Surabaya, and online classes nationwide, focusing on the needs of adult learners. Our programs offer small group classes as well as Hyperclass, an immersive way to learn and practice English. EF EFEKTA English for Adults is part of EFEKTA Education Group, an international education company that specializes in language training, educational travel, academic degree programs, and cultural exchange. With more than 600 schools and offices in more than 50 countries, EF is the largest private educational institution in the world and has helped millions of students worldwide to learn the English language since 1965.

company_desc: PT. Sinar Sosro was established in Cakung, Bekasi, Greater Jakarta, in 1974 to produce and market Tehbotol Sosro, the first ever bottled tea product in the world. PT Sinar Sosro produces and markets a wide variety of beverages, sold in bottles, cartons and other convenient to use packaging. Among the products targeted at household end users, traditional and modern markets, supermarkets, small to large-scale food outlets and restaurants, and food service companies in Indonesia, Southeast Asia, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and North America are Tehbotol Sosro, Fruit Tea Sosro, S-TEE, Tebs, Country Choice Juice Beverages, and Prim-A Drinking Water. PT Sinar Sosro, which has 10 sophisticated beverage production facilities supported by state-of-the-art technologies and highly skilled, especially trained workers in Sumatra, Java, and Bali, and 160 branch offices throughout Indonesia, strategically enhances and maintains the reputation of its flagship brand Tehbotol Sosro. PT Sinar Sosro holds a wide range of both domestic and international certifications, such as the Quality Standard Certificate from the Indonesian Ministry of Industry and the Halal (acceptable for consumption under Islamic law) Certificate from the Indonesian Ulemas Council (MUI), as well as the ISO 9000:2000 Certificate for Management Systems and the ISO 14000 Certificate for Environmental Feasibility of Operations.

company_desc: PT Nojorono Tobacco International merupakan salah satu perusahaan pelopor rokok kretek di Indonesia yang diinisiasi oleh Bapak Tjoa Kang Hay yang menunjuk kedua menantunya yakni Bapak Ko Djee Siong dan Bapak Tan Djing Thay. Seiring dengan perkembangan bisnis yang maju, kemudian perusahaan dikukuhkan pada 14 Oktober 1932 dan berpusat di Kota Kudus, Jawa Tengah. Saat ini, Nojorono Kudus menduduki posisi kelima dalam kategori industri sigaret terbesar di Indonesia. PT Nojorono Tobacco International dikenal sebagai pemilik merek dagang Minak Djinggo yang diluncurkan tahun 1932. Minak Djinggo merupakan pelopor inovasi Sigaret Kretek Tangan (SKT). Minak Djinggo bertahan di industri SKT hingga saat ini, cukup dikenal di kalangan petani dan nelayan. Terobosan berikut dari perusahaan adalah diluncurkannya Clas Mild, produk LTLN (Low Tar Low Nicotine) di tahun 2003. Dalam kurun waktu dua setengah tahun, Clas Mild mengukuhkan diri sebagai produk kretek filter rendah tar dan nikorin (Low Tar Low Nicotine â€“ LTLN) yang disukai konsumen hingga berhasil menjadi produk kretek filter terbaik di Indonesia.
job_desc_list: ['Menjalankan dan bertanggung jawab atas proses trial skala lab hingga skala short run terkait dengan New Product Development, New Product Launch, Improvement terhadap proses dan produk sesuai dengan prosedur yang ditentukan', 'Melakukan dan bertanggung jawab atas analisa hasil trial dan pembuatan laporan hasil trial secara lengkap dan terstruktur', 'Bertanggung jawab terhadap handling stronge sample material packaging dan produk hasil trial', 'Melakukan pembuatan technical drawing dengan aplikasi perangkat lunak dan membuat mock up material packaging yang dibutuhkan', 'Melakukan koordinasi dengan departemen lain terkait dengan final Art Work, pemesanan material sampling hingga final packaging, pengujian meterial samplae dan perencaan trial']

company_desc: At SwiftMind, we specialize in streamlining HR processes for dynamic and innovative companies, particularly within the IT sector. With a focus on startups and tech firms, our services are designed to not only fill the gap of an in-house HR department but also to enhance efficiency and strategic insight into HR management. Our offerings range from Talent Acquisition and Employee Life Cycle Administration to Legal and Compliance advisory, ensuring a comprehensive suite of services tailored to the unique needs of our clients. We pride ourselves on being not just a service provider, but a partner that understands and anticipates the needs of the fast-paced tech industry.

Our global standard quality is based on our experience with international manufacturers.

company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.

job_qualification_list: ['At least 2 years of tele-sales experience, preferably in financial services, forex, or trading (experience with digital marketing-generated leads is a plus).', 'Demonstrated ability to close sales and meet sales quotas in a competitive environment.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication, with the ability to engage and influence at all levels.', 'A self-starter with a strong desire to achieve sales goals and exceed expectations.', 'Exceptional customer service skills, with the ability to build rapport and maintain relationships with clients post-sale.', 'Strong organizational and time-management skills, able to handle multiple leads and follow-ups while maintaining focus on key priorities.', 'Works well with a team but also self-motivated to work independently to hit goals and deadlines.', 'You will be rewarded for your performance with an attractive base salary and the opportunity for unlimited earnings based on your success.', 'We are committed to helping you develop your skills and grow in the rapidly expanding forex industry.', 'Work alongside industry experts and be part of a forward-thinking, tech-driven brokerage.', 'Join a high-energy, collaborative team that values individual contributions while encouraging personal growth and professional development.']

company_desc: PT. Sinar Bintang Buana, dengan brand name House of Donatello adalah sebuah Perusahaan alas kaki yang didirikan di Bandung pada tahun 1999, menjual berbagai model alas kaki (sandal & sepatu) untuk berbagai kalangan usia dengan mengikuti trend yang ada. Selain alas kaki, juga menjual tas pria dan wanita yang trendi. House of Donatello telah beroperasi selama lebih dari 20 tahun, dan saat ini telah memiliki lebih dari 20 gerai yang tersebar di kota-kota di Indonesia. Perkembangan dunia fashion yang sangat cepat menjadi tantangan tersediri bagi House of Donatello untuk terus memberikan inovasi kreatif dan menjaga kualitas produk. Selain dari perkembangan dunia fashion, House of Donatello juga sangat aktif dalam mengikuti perkembangan teknologi untuk terus dapat menjangkau konsumen dan memberikan kemudahan bagi konsumen untuk dapat mengenal brand kami.

company_desc: FORMULATRIXÂ®Â was established in 2002 to provide protein crystallization automation solutions. job_desc_list: ['Maintain quality standards on all products to ensure manufacturing with zero defect methodology, along with required process documentation.', 'Identify lean and continuous improvement to existing processes and tooling related to current product lines with regard to cost, quality, and/or design.', 'Identify and investigate potential new tooling concepts and processes.', 'Analyze Moldflow simulation results, implement the solution in a new mold, define the molding process window, and make injection setting parameters based on scientific calculation.', 'Manage the technical part and mold tuning loops from Off Tool to Initial samples and manage the molding DoE.', 'Provide support on new product tooling launch and process at each milestone through production, providing the manufacturing and engineering inputs for the development of new processes, parts, and tooling.', 'Define and implement measurable improvements in materials, designs, and processes.', 'Define and duplicate the process window to ensure reliable and robust part validation and production.']

job_position: Sales Trainee Academy by Ruangguru - Depok Pancoran Mas
company_desc: Ruangguru merupakan perusahaan teknologi terbesar dan terlengkap di Indonesia yang berfokus pada layanan berbasis pendidikan dan telah memiliki lebih dari 13 juta pengguna serta telah mengelola lebih dari 500.000 guru yang menawarkan jasa di lebih dari 100 bidang pelajaran. job_position: Tech Mentor â€“ Apple Developer Academy @ UC
company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.
job_desc_list: ['Hi there! Apple Developer Academy @ UC is seeking a dynamic Tech Mentor with deep industry experience in native Apple app development and a genuine enthusiasm for mentoring. Join us in shaping the future of mobile technology!', 'What Youâ€™ll Do']
job_qualification_list: ['A minimum of a Bachelorâ€™s degree.', 'years in a senior technical role or 5+ years in hands-on mobile app development.', 'Proven expertise in building native Apple applications using tools such as UIKit, SwiftUI, and other Apple frameworks.', 'Strong command of the Swift programming language and mobile app engineering principles.', 'Experience working in Agile teams and applying Scrum or similar development methodologies.', 'A track record of empowering learners to achieve their fullest potential.', 'Familiarity with Challenge-Based Learning or Experiential Learning is a bonus.', 'Knowledge in AI/ML, Augmented Reality, or Game Development (Unity) is an added advantage.', 'Proficiency in English is essential.']

job_position: Professional Skill Mentor â€“ Apple Developer Academy @ UC
company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.
job_desc_list: ["Are you passionate about developing the professional skills that drive success? Our Academy is seeking a dynamic Professional Skill Mentor to empower the next generation of innovators. Bring your industry expertise in project management, leadership, communication, teamwork, and problem solving to inspire and transform our learners' journeys.", 'What Youâ€™ll Do']
job_qualification_list: ['A minimum of a Bachelorâ€™s degree.', 'At least 5+ years in a project management, leadership, or mentorship role, or 5+ years of relevant experience in business, education, or a related field.', 'Strong expertise in developing professional competencies across leadership, communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and project management.', 'Experience facilitating collaborative, inquiry-based, or experiential learning environments.', 'Demonstrated expertise in learning design and the ability to structure engaging and effective training activities, preferably with a corporate training background.', 'Experience with Challenge-Based Learning, experiential learning, or inquiry-based learning is a plus.', 'Background in coaching or human capital management is a plus.', 'Proficiency in English is essential.', 'We encourage you to include professional references from previous employers.']

company_desc: Fintopia Indonesia (PT Indonesia Fintopia Technology) is a subsidiary of Fintopia Inc. Founded in 2015 and headquartered in Beijing, China. job_desc_list: ['Develop and implement training programs for the telesales team, including onboarding for new hires and continuous skill enhancement training.', 'Design and optimize training courses on sales techniques, product knowledge, and customer communication to improve overall performance and conversion rates.', 'Conduct training sessions using various methods such as classroom training, case studies, and role-playing exercises to enhance practical skills.', 'Regularly assess training effectiveness, monitor traineesâ€™ progress, and provide tailored coaching and improvement plans.', 'Collaborate closely with telesales managers and teams to understand business needs and refine training strategies.', 'Identify challenges in the telesales process, propose effective solutions, and continuously improve training methodologies.', 'Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to ensure training content remains relevant and effective.']
job_qualification_list: ['At least 3 years of experience in sales, with a minimum of 2 years in training and coaching high-performing sales teams;', 'Experience in telesales, collections, insurance, finance, or other sales-driven industries is preferred;', 'Strong knowledge of telesales processes, sales techniques, customer psychology, and objection handling;', 'Proven ability to develop training courses, deliver engaging sessions, and effectively mentor sales professionals;', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire trainees;', 'Fluency in English;', 'Willing to adjust training strategies based on business needs and occasionally work on Saturdays if required']

job_position: Design Mentor â€“ Apple Developer Academy @ UC
company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.
job_desc_list: ['Are you a visionary design professional passionate about UX/UI and eager to shape the future of app innovation? Apple Developer Academy @ UC is searching for an experienced and dynamic Design Mentor to inspire, guide, and empower the next generation of world-class developers. Join us and make a lasting impact on design and technology!', 'What Youâ€™ll Do']
job_qualification_list: ["A minimum of a Bachelor's degree.", 'years in a senior design role or 4+ years of hands-on experience in app design.', 'Strong expertise in UX/UI design, including prototyping, usability testing, and user research.', 'Experience with Challenge-Based, experiential, or inquiry-based learning methodologies is a plus.', 'Familiarity with Agile teams and development methodologies, such as Scrum.', 'A proven ability to inspire and empower students or mentees to reach their full potential.', 'Bonus Skills: Knowledge in areas like game design, 3D asset creation, or augmented reality.', 'Strong proficiency in English.']

company_desc: Universitas Ciputra memiliki komitmen bahwa disetiap alur studi/konsentrasi yang ada memiliki tujuan sama yaitu membekali setiap mahasiswa agar mampu menjadi Entrepreneur sesuai keahlian masing-masing. Pendidikan dan Praktek Entrepreneurship diberikan secara merata disemua alur studi/konsentrasi mulai dari awal perkuliahan dimulai sampai akhir perkuliahan. Entrepreneurship memiliki arti yang lebih luas dari sekedar berjualan, membuka dan menjalankan bisnis karena didalamnya terdapat unsur kreatifitas & inovasi, kemampuan membaca kebutuhan pasar (market sensitivity) dan pengambilan resiko yang terhitung (calculated risk taking). Pada era masa kini, tantangan zaman semakin berat, kompetisi global terjadi, oleh karena itu Entrepreneur yang dihasilkan oleh institusi pendidikan tinggi haruslah Entrepreneur intelektual dengan keahlian sesuai bidang yang dipelajarinya. Tuntutan zaman ini yang mendorong kami untuk semakin meningkatkan dan mengembangkan kualitas dalam segala hal diantaranya adalah penambahan dan pengembangan beberapa program yang ditawarkan ke calon mahasiswa.
job_desc_list: ['Pengajaran & Bimbingan â€“ Mengajar, membimbing mahasiswa, dan mengembangkan kurikulum.', 'Penelitian & Publikasi â€“ Melakukan riset, menulis jurnal, dan mencari pendanaan penelitian.', 'Pengabdian Masyarakat â€“ Memberikan pelatihan, konsultasi, dan kontribusi bagi komunitas.', 'Pengembangan Profesional â€“ Mengikuti konferensi, membangun jejaring, dan mengembangkan keahlian.', 'Kepemimpinan Akademik â€“ Berperan dalam administrasi, kebijakan akademik, dan akreditasi.']
job_qualification_list: ['Kualifikasi Akademik â€“ Memiliki gelar Professor Doktor (Prof. PhD) di bidang Manajemen atau disiplin terkait.', 'Pengalaman Mengajar & Penelitian â€“ Berpengalaman dalam pengajaran di perguruan tinggi serta memiliki publikasi ilmiah di jurnal bereputasi.', 'Kompetensi Profesional â€“ Menguasai teori dan praktik manajemen serta memiliki jaringan akademik dan industri yang luas.', 'Kemampuan Kepemimpinan & Administrasi â€“ Berpengalaman dalam kepemimpinan akademik, pengelolaan program studi, dan akreditasi.', 'Komitmen Pengabdian Masyarakat â€“ Aktif dalam memberikan pelatihan, konsultasi, dan kontribusi terhadap pengembangan masyarakat.']

company_desc: PT. Adira Dinamika Multi Finance, Tbk (Adira Finance) berdiri pada tahun 1990 semula dikembangkan sebagai perusahaan pembiayaan mobil, yang kemudian sejak tahun 1997 merambah ke pembiayaan sepeda motor. Pada tahun 2004, Adira Finance mencatatkan sahamnya di Bursa Efek Jakarta (sekarang Bursa Efek Indonesia) dan diambil alih oleh PT. Bank Danamon Indonesia, Tbk (Bank Danamon).
job_desc_list: ['Membuat registrasi atas setiap surat pengajuan yang berkaitan dengan biaya-biaya Collection.', 'Mencetak, mengirimkan dan menginput hasil Surat Peringatan kepada Nasabah melalui pihak ekspedisi.', 'Menyiapkan dan mengirimkan Surat Somasi kepada Nasabah berdasarkan dokumen penerimaan unit.', 'Meregister dan menyimpan DKHC/DKHR/Surat Tugas/Surat Kuasa/BAST yang sudah dikembalikan oleh Remedial Officer dan Eksternal Collector', 'Mengkoordinir kerapihan dan ketertiban filling dokumen-dokumen Collection termasuk copy MOU Eksternal Collection dan dokumen pendukung MOU.', 'Meregistrasi dokumen penyerahan unit dari Remedial Officer atau Eksternal Collection dan proses pick up unit berdasarkan dokumen penyerahan unit']
job_qualification_list: ['Pendidikan minimal D3 dari semua jurusan dengan IPK minimal 2.50', 'Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun pada bidang Collection', 'Memiliki pengalaman di perusahaan multifinance menjadi nilai tambah', 'Usia maksimal 29 tahun', 'Keterampilan interpersonal dan komunikasi yang sangat baik, dengan kemampuan yang terbukti untuk membangun dan memimpin tim secara efektif.', 'Keterampilan analitis yang kuat dengan pendekatan yang kreatif dan komprehensif untuk memecahkan masalah dan membuat keputusan', 'Kemampuan yang untuk berpikir secara strategis dan inovatif, dengan fokus pada penyampaian hasil dan mendorong pertumbuhan bisnis']

company_desc: Ruangguru merupakan perusahaan teknologi terbesar dan terlengkap di Indonesia yang berfokus pada layanan berbasis pendidikan dan telah memiliki lebih dari 13 juta pengguna serta telah mengelola lebih dari 500.000 guru yang menawarkan jasa di lebih dari 100 bidang pelajaran. company_desc: Transvision Lahir pada tanggal 8 Oktober 2013 dari sinergi 2 kekuatan terbaik dalam Infrastruktur Telekomunikasi dan Media di Indonesia, yaitu CT Corpora dan Telkom yang sukses melakukan Sinergi Bisnis kepemilikan TelkomVision. Dengan bersinerginya dua korporasi besar tersebut, diharapkan Transvision akan dapat menjadi pemimpin dalam industri TV Berlangganan. Mewarisi tradisi perusahaan terbaik, Transvision selalu mengedepankan sikap kerja keras, kerja cerdas, komitmen, dan memberikan kontribusi yang luar biasa untuk menghasilkan sebuah mahakarya yang indah. Transvision, TV Berlangganan terbaik di Indonesia yang mengedepankan kepuasan pelanggan serta pelayanan prima, memastikan bahwa sajian tayangan istimewa yang diberikan menggunakan teknologi terdepan dan terbaru. Hadir berbeda, kini Transvision memperkuat ragam tontonan berkelas dan berkualitas bagi semua pelanggan dengan kualitas gambar super tajam. Diperkaya dengan 50 channel High Definition (HD) kualitas terbaik, 10 channel inhouse & ditambah channel eksklusif: CNN Indonesia, CNBC Indonesia dan channel Golf+ yang menghadirkan turnamen golf PGA Tour terlengkap. Tidak hanya dari sisi tayangan terbaik, Transvision juga memberikan layanan Customer Service yang berkelas. Terbukti dengan diraihnya penghargaan Best Contact Center 2016 & 2017, disamping Digital Marketing Award 2016 serta Indonesia WOW Brand 2017. Dari sisi keuntungan berlangganan, Transvision memberikan banyak sekali benefit yang sangat menguntungkan bagi pelanggan. Dengan semangat transformasi dan inovasi, ke depannya Transvision yakin akan terus melakukan yang terbaik dalam memberikan kepuasan pelanggan sebagai prioritas utama dan menjadi TV Berlangganan terbaik bagi keluarga Indonesia.

company_desc: Established in 1989, PT. Pratama Abadi Industri is a foreign investment company (Korean) that runs manufacturing athletic shoes for the NIKE brand. This company is considered one of the shoe manufacturers with the most extended history in producing athletic shoes for the NIKE brand in Indonesia. Supported by four factories, Serpong Factory (Head Office), Sukabumi Factory, Brebes Factory, and Garut Factory. Pratama Abadi Industri can produce 2 million pairs of high-quality athletic shoes a month. Equipped with modern technology machinery and supported by our experienced team are committed to creating high-quality athletic shoes. Our vision is to be a world-class footwear manufacturer and our mission is to lead the Change to be a sustainable source base. We have teamwork and work team, ownership, quality first, defiance, and open mind as our core values.

company_desc: Mandarin Oriental is the award-winning owner and operator of some of the worldâ€™s most luxurious hotels, resorts and residences. Renowned for creating outstanding properties, each destination reflects the Groupâ€™s dual Asian heritage, local culture and unique design. Driven by a passion for the exceptional, every day, everywhere, the Groupâ€™s mission is to craft time enriching experiences that transform the ordinary to the exceptional and guests to fans through its legendary service. The Group now operates 43 hotels, 12 residences and 26 exclusive homes in 26 countries and territories with many more projects under development. Mandarin Oriental continues to drive its reputation as an innovative leader in luxury hospitality, delivering sustainable growth over the long term. The Group is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group.

Our hyper focused on community segmentation makes our growth & engagement extremely high because it's very relatable with our audience preferences: Girls community, Music & Entertainment, Sports, Foodies, Millenials, and many more.
job_desc_list: ['Lead and inspire the creative team in developing engaging, original ideas for campaigns across multiple channels (digital, print, video, etc.).', 'Collaborate with clients to understand their brand and translate that into unique creative concepts.', 'Oversee the execution of creative projects from concept through production, ensuring all work is aligned with brand guidelines.', 'Work closely with the strategy, content, and design teams to ensure seamless integration of creative ideas into broader campaigns.', 'Stay ahead of industry trends and push the creative boundaries to deliver standout work.', 'Manage multiple projects, timelines, and creative team members to ensure on-time delivery and high-quality output.']

job_qualification_list: ['Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Computer Science or related fields', 'year experience as Quality Assurance/Software Tester', 'Experience in software testing (alpha and beta testing)', 'Experience in Automatic Testing, Whitebox & Blackbox, Software Tester, SDLC, SQL, RDBMS, Programming', 'Have knowledge in ETL and Query SQL', 'Have experience develop test strategy, test plans, test design, test cases and test scenario', 'Familiar with programming language (Python, PHP, Vue Js, React JS, Android Studio, Flutter)', 'Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools']

company_desc: PT. Royal Trust adalah perusahaan perdagangan yang didirikan pada tahun 2005 dibawah naungan Kementrian Perdagangan dan telah memiliki ijin resmi, diawasi oleh BAPPEBTI sejak tahun 2006, menjadi anggota BBJ sejak tahun 2005 dan menjadi anggota KBI sejak tahun 2012 Sebagai salah satu perusahaan perdagangan komoditi terkemuka di Indonesia, PT. Melalui penyediaan informasi dan layanan berkualitas, PT Royal Trust berupaya menjaga tingkat kepuasan nasabah.
company_industry: Private Equity, Investment Banking, Venture Capital
job_desc_list: ['Membantu Divisi yang bersangkutan untuk semua hal yang berhubungan dengan masalah administrasi', 'Melakukan dokumentasi dan pengarsipan', 'Melakukan kegiatan administarsi secara umum', 'Mempersiapkan dan menyortir dokumen sebelum datanya dimasukkan ke dalam komputer.', 'Memasukkan data ke dalam database milik perusahaan.', 'Memeriksa dan memastikan keakuratan data yang sudah dimasukkan ke dalam database.', 'Menyelesaikan perbedaan informasi dan data yang tidak lengkap.', 'Menanggapi permintaan informasi dari anggota yang berwenang.', 'Mengelola dokumen dan catatan dengan baik.', 'Menyiapkan laporan yang relevan sesuai dengan kebutuhan.', 'Mengidentifikasi dan mengoreksi kesalahan saat memasukkan data menggunakan metode kontrol']
job_qualification_list: ['Minimal pendidikan SMA/D3 atau sederajat', 'Memiliki kemampuan memakai komputer yang baik', 'Memiliki kemampuan mengetik secara cepat', 'Memiliki pengalaman di bidang administrasi', 'Berpenampilan menarik, bersih dan rapi', 'Mampu mengoperasikan Ms. Office', 'Memiliki kemampuan berbahasa Inggris']

company_desc: Introducing your new friend to fulfill all your daily needs - AlloFresh, supermarket at your doorstep! Established in early 2022, AlloFresh is a joint venture company between Bukalapak, an all-commerce unicorn company, and Trans Retail Indonesia, a giant retail company under CT Corp Group. AlloFresh focuses on providing fast delivery across Indonesia. We offers a wide range of products to meet the diverse needs of our customers.
job_desc_list: ['As a Data Analyst Intern, you will work closely with our data analysts, business teams, and data engineers to create impactful dashboards and automate reporting processes. Your primary focus will be on building intuitive, user-friendly dashboards using tools like Looker Data Studio or Metabase, and automating the delivery of key metrics to stakeholders across the organization.', 'This role is perfect for someone who is passionate about turning data into actionable insights and wants to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced, data-driven environment.']
job_qualification_list: ['Strong SQL skills for querying and manipulating data.', 'Proficiency in data visualization tools like Looker Data Studio, Metabase, Tableau, or Power BI.', 'Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.', 'Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.', 'Excellent communication skills to present insights to non-technical stakeholders.', 'Attention to detail and a commitment to data accuracy.', 'Strong statistical skills', 'Familiarity with Python and data science libraries (e.g., Pandas, Matplotlib, Sklearn).', 'Basic understanding of data warehousing concepts (e.g., BigQuery, Snowflake).']

company_desc: PT.
